name: Burg_442
culture_notes: language: Coastal Tongues with Island Creole loanwords
cuisine: salted fish and preserved kelp
constraints: no instant resurrection or life-replacement magics
navigational auguries require charts and seamanship
ritual magic consumes scarce imported reagents
notes: population unknown; likely transient mariner mix
small strategic harbor for coastal voyages
limited combustion industry; labor-intensive ritual work
